name: Voices of Belfast
description:
Instructions: Arrow keys on the keyboard to move and X and Z to zoom in/out. S to turn sound on/off. Headphones recommended.

This is a project is an interactive experience about conflict in Northern Ireland, dealing with issues from the Troubles and the current ongoing peace process. Explore and interact with the voices of musicians, artists, poets, and ordinary people, and find out what resonates with you.

I made this for the class "Art, Conflict, and Technology in Northern Ireland" at Carnegie Mellon University in spring 2018. The accompanying contextual paper can be found at https://www.academia.edu/s/62b4106f7a/voices-of-belfast-contextual-paper
